edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.processor

Class ProcessorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.processor.ProcessorFactory

  • public abstract class ProcessorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to obtain an instance of a Processor for a given source format, as defined in the configuration.

      • getProcessor

        public static Processor getProcessor(SourceFormat sourceFormat)
                              throws UnsupportedSourceFormatException,
                                     java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Alternative to getProcessor(SourceFormat, Resolver) that doesn't take a resolver parameter, nor throw an IncompatibleResolverException.
        Parameters:
        sourceFormat -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedSourceFormatException
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException

      • getProcessor

        public static Processor getProcessor(SourceFormat sourceFormat,
                                     Resolver resolver)
                              throws IncompatibleResolverException,
                                     UnsupportedSourceFormatException,
                                     java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Parameters:
        sourceFormat - The source format for which to return an instance, based on configuration settings. If unsure, use SourceFormat.UNKNOWN.
        resolver - Resolver from which the processor will be reading
        Returns:
        An instance suitable for handling the given source format, based on configuration settings.
        Throws:
        IncompatibleResolverException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If a fallback processor is needed but not defined.
        UnsupportedSourceFormatException - If the processor assigned to the given source format, or the fallback processor, does not support the format.
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - If a defined processor class is not found or cannot be instantiated.
